items.title: With screen reader text in notification

props.name: notification
props.docblock: Specifies notification bubble content. It appears on the top right of the `Tab`.

description.text: Specifies notification bubble content. It appears on the top right of the `Tab`.

props.name: eventKey
props.docblock:
A unique identifier for the Component, the `eventKey` makes it distinguishable
from others in a set. Similar to React's `key` prop, in that it only needs to be
unique amongst the Components siblings, not globally.

description.text:
A unique identifier for the Component, the `eventKey` makes it distinguishable
from others in a set. Similar to React's `key` prop, in that it only needs to be
unique amongst the Components siblings, not globally.

props.name: tabClassName
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Specifies elements that is processed to create tabs.

description.text: Specifies elements that is processed to create tabs.

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.
